header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_bc42036.50a618fba427cb50ad2492726f494f58db1d117b.zh-tw is different with handoff file name: bc42036.50a618fba427cb50ad2492726f494f58db1d117b.zh-tw.

trans-unit.source: Operands of type Object used in expressions for 'Select', 'Case' statements; runtime errors could occur | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 類型的運算元物件用於運算式 'Select'、 'Case' 陳述式。可能發生執行階段錯誤 |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Operands of type Object used in expressions for 'Select', 'Case' statements; runtime errors could occur
trans-unit.target: 類型的運算元物件用於運算式 'Select'、 'Case' 陳述式。可能發生執行階段錯誤

trans-unit.source: A `Select`...`Case` construction uses one or more expressions of the [Object Data Type](../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/object-data-type.md).
trans-unit.target: A `Select`...`Case`結構使用的一或多個運算式[Object 資料型別](../../visual-basic/language-reference/data-types/object-data-type.md)。

trans-unit.source: When a variable or expression evaluates to `Object`, the compiler must perform *late binding*, which causes extra operations at run time.
trans-unit.target: 變數或運算式評估為 `Object`時，編譯器必須執行 *「晚期繫結」*(late binding)，因而導致執行階段的額外作業。

trans-unit.source: It also exposes your application to potential run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: 它也可能會讓您的應用程式發生執行階段錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you assign a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> to an `Object` variable and then try to compare it with a number, the runtime throws an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> because Visual Basic cannot convert a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> object to a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>至`Object`變數，然後嘗試以數字進行比較，會擲回執行階段<xref:System.InvalidCastException>因為無法轉換 Visual Basic<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>物件為數值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.InvalidCastException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The expressions in a `Select`...`Case` construction should all be of the same data type or of closely related data types that can be converted to each other.
trans-unit.target: `Select`...`Case` 建構中的運算式應該全部是相同的資料類型，或可以相互轉換、密切相關的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: This is because each `Case` statement compares at least one value against the test expression on which the `Select`...`Case` construction is based.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為每個 `Case` 陳述式會針對 `Select`...`Case` 建構所根據的測試運算式，至少比較一個值。

trans-unit.source: By default, this message is a warning.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個訊息是一個警告。

trans-unit.source: For information on hiding warnings or treating warnings as errors, see [Configuring Warnings in Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic).
trans-unit.target: 如需隱藏警告或將警告視為錯誤的相關資訊，請參閱 [Configuring Warnings in Visual Basic](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/configuring-warnings-in-visual-basic)。

trans-unit.source: If possible, arrange all the expressions to evaluate to data types for which comparison operators are defined.
trans-unit.target: 可能的話，請排列所有運算式，以評估為其定義比較運算子的資料類型。
[在 Visual Basic 中的算術運算子](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/arithmetic-operators.md)
[在 Visual Basic 中的比較運算子](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/operators-and-expressions/comparison-operators.md)
